name: Network Penetration Tests
description: Techniques for conducting penetration tests on enterprise and cloud networks.

cards.title: Network Scanning and Reconnaissance
cards.description: Identifying open ports, services, and vulnerabilities using network scanning techniques.
cards.summaryText: Sweep the network with recon tooling to map ports, services, and soft spots.

cards.title: Exploiting and Gaining Access
cards.description: Using Metasploit, exploitation scripts, and privilege escalation techniques.
cards.bulletpoints: Brute-Force Attacks, Credential Stuffing, Remote Code Execution
cards.summaryText: Chain exploits, crack creds, and escalate privileges until full control is yours.
